description.value: The nymph queen focuses her beauty upon a target within her aura. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:0] save. On a failure, it is affected as if by the nymph queen's nymph's beauty aura; if it was already affected by the aura, it suffers a greater effect described in the nymph queen's entry. A nymph queen can Focus Beauty on a given creature only once per turn.
